document_title: What is cystic acne? Identification characteristics of common types today
subsection_content: Do not squeeze acne. The reason is that when you use unsanitary hands to squeeze acne, bacteria from your hands will enter the open wound, causing inflammation of the pores and that area of ​​skin. The infection becomes severe and spreads deep under the skin and can form an abscess. At that time, treatment will be difficult and may leave scars after treatment.
subsection_title: mun boc.json. Should acne be squeezed?
subsection_data:
mun boc.json. Should acne be squeezed?
Do not squeeze acne. The reason is that when you use unsanitary hands to squeeze acne, bacteria from your hands will enter the open wound, causing inflammation of the pores and that area of ​​skin. The infection becomes severe and spreads deep under the skin and can form an abscess. At that time, treatment will be difficult and may leave scars after treatment.
